short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A lightweight blue light filter for Chrome

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Blue Light Filter is a powerful and easy-to-use Chrome extension that acts as a blue light blocker, helping to reduce eye strain and improve sleep quality by dimming the blue light emitted from your screen. Whether you’re working late at night or browsing during the day, the Blue Light Filter Blocker adjusts the color temperature of your screen to a warmer, eye-friendly hue, creating a more comfortable viewing experience.

Key Features of our Blue Light Filter:
- Customizable Filter Levels: Easily adjust the intensity of the blue light filter with the intuitive slider in the extension's popup. Find the perfect screen shade for your eyes.
- Quick Toggle: Turn the filter on or off with a single click. The extension remembers your last used setting, so you can quickly return to your preferred screen dimmer level.
- Seamless Integration: Works smoothly across all websites you visit. Whether you’re reading, coding, or watching videos, Blue Light Dimmer ensures a consistent, dimmed viewing experience.
- Eye-Friendly Design: The extension's interface is simple, clean, and visually appealing, making it easy to use for everyone.
- Lightweight & Efficient: Blue Light Dimmer is optimized for performance, ensuring that your browsing experience remains fast and responsive.

Why Use a Blue Light Filter?
Exposure to blue light, especially during the evening, can interfere with your natural sleep patterns and cause eye discomfort. Blue Light Blocker helps mitigate these effects by acting as a blue light filter, replacing harsh blue light with a warmer tone. This not only protects your eyes but also promotes better sleep if you use your computer late at night.

Blue Light Filter's are Perfect for:
- Night Owls: Reduce the negative impact of late-night screen time on your sleep with this effective blue light blocker.
- Frequent Readers: Make long reading sessions easier on your eyes by using a customizable screen dimmer.
- Everyone: Protect your eyes with a simple, one-click solution that acts as both a blue light filter and screen shade.

Get Started
Install Blue Light Filter Blocker today and start protecting your eyes with just a click. Adjust the settings to find your perfect comfort level, and enjoy a more soothing browsing experience, day or night.

Support & Feedback
We’re constantly working to improve our Blue Light Filter. If you have any questions, suggestions, or issues, please don’t hesitate to reach out to us. Your feedback is invaluable in helping us enhance the extension.
